[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/schemes/fptx.rs] [Integration] [Consensus usage] How is FPTX integrated with Aptos consensus, and can Byzantine validators exploit the encryption scheme to break safety? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/schemes/fptx.rs] [Integration] [Transaction encryption] Can attackers submit encrypted transactions that pass validation but cause decryption to fail after consensus, wasting resources? (Medium)
